column6: Wolverine's not himself - in fact, he's possessed by the Muramasa Sword! The beast within the blade has targeted Jessica Drew, a.k.a. Spider-Woman, for sacrifice; only her best friend and a longtime enemy can save her!
column8: | penciller (cover):John Buscema | writer:Chris Claremont | editor:Bob Harras | penciller:Kevin Nowlan | colorist:Glynis Oliver | letterer:Tom Orzechowski | inker:Al Williamson
